content: Great read! Completely agree in the differences between the two the core of Snapchat is in users messaging each other compared to sharing photos on Instagram — A big difference of intent. In a post I wrote a couple of weeks ago (when Facebook stories launched) I landed upon the idea that this might actually help Instagram in terms of the stories feature even more so with Snapchat looking to focus on more TV style content on Snapchat discover & perhaps less on stories itself. Can you see this being likely?
